opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: KSR International Co. v. Teleflex Inc.

opinion:
548 U.S. 902 (2006)

KSR INTERNATIONAL CO.
v.
TELEFLEX INC. ET AL.

No. 04-1350.

Supreme Court of United States.

June 26, 2006.

Motions of Progress & Freedom Foundation, Twenty-Four Intellectual Property Law Professors, and Cisco Systems Inc. et al. for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari granted.
